description:
Ready to rock out to the genesis of 80s video game tunes? This mega DLC pack will drive your earbuds to new heights by offering the entire Gotta Protectors: Cart of Darkness soundtrack in new "MD" and "88" sound chip formats, recorded on authentic hardware by the legendary Yuzo Koshiro!

Go to Options â†’ Sound Settings from the main menu to change the game's sound chip.

This DLC also includes 20 additional campaign stages as part of the Bonus Scenario A story, plus new skills for the Fighter and Archer characters!

* This DLC is included in the Gotta Protectors: Cart of Darkness DLC Discount Bundle (DLC Packs 1-4) and the Gotta Protectors: Cart of Darkness Ultimate Deluxe Bundle (Main Game + All DLC), sold separately. Please take care not to re-purchase the same content.
name: Gotta Protectors: Cart of Darkness DLC Pack 1: Mega Blastin' Trax + Bonus Scenario A
